alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette, northern Oconto and east central Langlade Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Carter, or 21 miles southeast of Crandon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gardner Dam Scout Camp around 605 PM CDT. Mountain and Bear Paw Scout Camp around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Boot Lake Campground, Townsend, Caldron Falls Reservoir, Governor Thompson State Park, White Potato Lake, Boulder Lake Campground, Hollister, Crooked Lake, Langlade and Lily. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
